query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_upgrades,
  COUNT(DISTINCT player_name) as unique_players,
  COUNT(DISTINCT team_abbrev) as unique_teams,
  MIN(timestamp) as earliest_upgrade,
  MAX(timestamp) as latest_upgrade
FROM upgrade_log;

  COUNT(DISTINCT team_abbrev) as unique_teams,
  MIN(timestamp) as earliest_upgrade,
